Eddy Lin.description: conversing about Tom Moreno and Eddy Lin are discussing their composition project, exploring new musical styles, planning to showcase their work at Hobbs Cafe, involving the community, collaborating with local historians, artists, and musicians, organizing a storytelling and music workshop with local school children, incorporating traditional folk music, and seeking support from the community center. @ <persona> Tom Moreno
chat: Tom Moreno
Hey Eddy, how's the composition project coming along? I heard you've been practicing different instruments for it.
Eddy Lin
Hey Tom, thanks for asking. It's coming along well, I've been exploring some new musical styles to incorporate into it.
Tom Moreno
That's great to hear, Eddy. I think our project is really shaping up nicely with these new musical styles. Have you thought about where we could showcase our work once it's completed?
Eddy Lin
I was thinking we could potentially host an event at Hobbs Cafe once our project is completed. It could be a great way to involve the community and showcase our collaboration.
Tom Moreno
That sounds like a great idea, Eddy. Hosting the event at Hobbs Cafe would be perfect to involve the community and showcase our collaboration. Let's discuss more details and start planning for it.
Eddy Lin
I agree, hosting the event at Hobbs Cafe would definitely bring the community together. We should start brainstorming ideas for the event.
Tom Moreno
Let's meet up later this week to further discuss our project and the event at Hobbs Cafe. Maybe we can go grab a coffee and brainstorm some more ideas.
Eddy Lin

That sounds like a fantastic plan, Tom. I'm looking forward to meeting later this week to discuss our project and the event at Hobbs Cafe. I'll come prepared with some creative ideas for us to consider.
Tom Moreno
Sounds like our project is going to be a hit at Hobbs Cafe. I'm excited to see it all come together.
Eddy Lin

I agree, hosting the event at Hobbs Cafe would definitely bring the community together. Let's make sure to involve local historians, artists, and musicians to gather stories and perspectives for our project.
Tom Moreno
I think involving local historians, artists, and musicians to gather stories and perspectives for our project is a brilliant idea. It will add a lot of depth and richness to our collaboration.
Eddy Lin
We should also consider organizing a storytelling and music workshop with local school children to engage the younger generation and showcase their creativity.
Tom Moreno

I think reaching out to the local school for a storytelling and music workshop would really engage the younger generation and add a unique element to our project. Let's explore that possibility as well.
Eddy Lin
I also think incorporating traditional folk music into our composition would be a great idea. Let's explore Johnson Park for inspiration and gather more insights.
Tom Moreno

Eddy, I completely agree with your suggestions. Engaging the younger generation and incorporating traditional folk music will truly make our project stand out. Let's definitely plan a visit to Johnson Park to gather inspiration.
Eddy Lin
We should also reach out to the community center for support in organizing the event at Hobbs Cafe and involving the local community.
